FANG.Name: Ninjo's FANG
FANG.Subtitle: Character (PC/NPC) Relationships
FANG.KeybindingHint: Opens the interactive FANG Actor relationship graph.

UI.ShowPlayersHint: Shows the graph to all players in a normal window
UI.ShowMonitorHint: Shows the graph in fullscreen only on the monitor
UI.ClosePlayersHint: Closes the graph for all players
UI.CloseMonitorHint: Closes the graph only on the monitor

Journal.Title: About FANG
Journal.Desc1: This journal saves the graph data in the background.
Journal.Desc2: To open the graph, click the button below or press Shift + G on your keyboard.

Messages.GraphShown: FANG Graph is now shown to all players!
Messages.GraphMonitorShown: FANG Graph is sent to the monitor in fullscreen!
Messages.JournalMissing: No FANG Graph Journal found. A GM must open this tool first.
Messages.SaveNoPermission: No permission to save the FANG Graph.
Messages.WarningSelfLink: A token cannot be connected to itself!
Messages.WarningNoDeleteSelect: Please select an element to delete.

Dialogs.RoleContent: Enter a role or organization for {actor} (optional):

CosmicWind.Name: Cosmic Wind (Floating Tokens)
CosmicWind.Hint: When enabled, tokens will gently drift and float on the graph once the initial physics simulation has settled. This gives the graph a dynamic, magical, and breathing feel.

CosmicWindStrength.Name: Cosmic Wind Strength
CosmicWindStrength.Hint: Determines how far the tokens drift across the graph. (1 = Barely visible, 10 = Strong swaying).
